turkish_example_sentence: Sen bu gizli sırrı komşulara dememiş olsaydın herkes huzurlu yaşardı
english_example_sentence: If you had not said this secret to the neighbors, everyone would have lived peacefully
russian_example_sentence: Если бы ты не сказал этот секрет соседям, все бы жили спокойно
